Title: Prohibits for-profit bail bond business; repealer
Summary: Prohibits any person, partnership, or corporation from engaging in the for-profit bail bond business.
LawCode: Amd §§520.10, 500.10 & 520.30, rpld §500.10 sub 16, CP L; amd Art 68 Art Head, rpld §§6801, 6802, 6803 & 6804, ren §6805 to be §6801, Ins L; amd Gen Bus L, generally
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, the insurance law and the general business law, in relation to prohibiting the bail bond business; and to repeal certain provisions of such laws, relating thereto
